perturbation.original_text: "We are excited about the  opportunities  available to us as a result of our new partnership  with BISYS," stated Thomas C. Gregor,  chairman and chief executive officer of United National.  "During the past year we completed an assessment of our  information  processing  needs going forward into the next  century.  After evaluating a number of different options, we determined that the flexibility and quality of BISYS'  TOTALPLUS (R) system would best serve our needs today and for years to come."
perturbation.changed_text: "We are excited about the opportunities potentially available to us as a result of our new partnership with BISYS," stated Thomas C. Gregor, chairman and chief executive officer of United National. "During the past year we completed an assessment of our information processing needs going forward into the next century. After evaluating a number of different options, we believe that the flexibility and quality of BISYS' TOTALPLUS (R) system might serve our needs today and for years to come."
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'opportunities available' to 'opportunities potentially available' and 'would best serve' to 'might serve' introduces ambiguity about the certainty of benefits expected from the partnership. This ambiguity reduces the binding nature of the agreement and shifts the commitment to BISYS' services.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of Contract principles under New Jersey law (since the company is located in Bridgewater, NJ). A valid contract requires a 'meeting of the minds,' which includes a clear understanding of the expected benefits. Ambiguity around the core service provision undermines this clarity.

perturbation.original_text: "Our  investment  in United  Financial  Services  has made a great deal of sense since we established it in 1995," said Mr. Gregor.  "United Financial  Services has allowed  United  National to realize  significant  efficiencies  through the sharing of technology and processing  costs.  Nevertheless,  we believe that the enhanced  capabilities  which  BISYS  offers  are  better  matched to the future direction of our Bank."
perturbation.changed_text: "Our investment in United Financial Services may have made sense since we established it in 1995," said Mr. Gregor. "United Financial Services might have allowed United National to see some efficiencies through the sharing of technology and processing costs. Nevertheless, we anticipate that the capabilities which BISYS offers are somewhat better matched to the possible future direction of our Bank."
perturbation.explanation: Replacing 'has made a great deal of sense' with 'may have made sense,' 'has allowed United National to realize significant efficiencies' with 'might have allowed United National to see some efficiencies,' and 'future direction' with 'possible future direction' introduces doubt about the past performance of United Financial Services and the future benefits expected from BISYS. It transforms definitive statements into speculative ones.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of Contract principles under New Jersey law. The introduced ambiguity makes it harder to prove reliance on specific, promised benefits, potentially weakening any future claim of breach based on BISYS not delivering expected results.
